title: 4C/ID-Based Science Education Curriculum for Solving Real-World Problems

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: The learner is a job seeker with beginner-level expertise in science, requiring enhancement of complex problem-solving competencies. Asynchronous learning is conducted via LMS in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners solve real-life scientific problems by applying the four components of the 4C/ID model (learning tasks, supportive information, part-task practice, coaching)
Learners perform systematic analysis → strategy development → implementation → evaluation processes for complex scientific problems with ≥80% accuracy
Learners iteratively improve problem-solving processes ≥3 times through peer feedback and instructor coaching

resources: Case-based problem scenarios (e.g., environmental pollution, energy efficiency)
Digital Collaboration Tools (Padlet, Google Docs, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
